text: Thanks! :] How was your weekend? Have you made any progress on your project? It's my girlfriends birthday so didn't have too productive a time! haha That's cool, my course was the same really, I did Multimedia at Nottingham Trent, our lecturer pushed for character animation too but I didn't really get too into that and always preferred look dev and fx :slightly_smiling_face: do you have any other projects for this year or will this one be the focus?
